items.title: Paramount, Skydance merger set for August; deal worth $8 billion
items.description: Paramount Global and Skydance Media announced Friday that their merger will take place next month, barring any issues with the $8 billion deal.

items.title: Official fired during Trump's first term appointed president of embattled U.S. Institute of Peace

items.title: Trump links Thailand, Cambodia trade deals to ceasefire
items.description: President Trump on Saturday said no trade deals would be struck with Thailand and Cambodia until they cease fighting.
